parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240017) at the end. This strongly suggests electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for campaign finance reporting and are mandated for candidates.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to Vasile Roman, a candidate for the Chamber of Deputies for the PSD party.  His position on the ballot (2) is clearly stated. This fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post uses the phrases "Dragi prieteni, dragi maramureșeni" (Dear friends, dear people of Maramureș), and "publicul larg" (the wide public) is implied by the paid Facebook post's nature and targeting. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to vote for Vasile Roman. The call to action ("mergeți la vot și să votați Vasile Roman") explicitly aims to influence the election outcome. This clearly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate and encourages voting for him.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a direct appeal for votes, presented in a promotional manner.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>930934385156486</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to a specific candidate (Vasile Roman), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has the clear objective of influencing voters to choose him. The presence of a CMF number further reinforces this conclusion.  The post's timing, after the official campaign period, is also a significant factor.  There are no counterarguments to suggest this is not electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>VASILE ROMAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Roman Vasile], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 930934385156486) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Vasile Roman (PSD) la alegerile parlamentare,  cu un buget de sub 100 RON,  având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru acesta. Postarea, adresată publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe Facebook, conține o solicitare explicită de vot pentru Vasile Roman, precizând poziția sa pe buletinul de vot (poziția 2) și include numărul CMF 11240017, indicând clar natura sa de propagandă electorală.  Această postare, având în vedere conținutul său și contextul post-electoral, constituie o încălcare clară a legislației.  Datele de contact ale advertiserului sunt: romanvasile10@yahoo.com și +40754535452.  Postarea a atins între 4000 și 5000 de impresii, cu o estimare a audienței de 10.000 - 50.000 de persoane.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
